products.name: Wireless Earbuds
products.brief_description: High-fidelity wireless earbuds with noise-canceling technology and long battery life.
reference_descriptions: Experience the ultimate in wireless freedom with our high-fidelity earbuds. Featuring noise-canceling technology and up to 20 hours of battery life, these earbuds are perfect for music lovers on the go.
Our wireless earbuds offer superior sound quality and comfort. With easy touch controls and a sleek design, enjoy your favorite tunes anytime, anywhere.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.brief_description: A stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking and heart rate monitoring.
reference_descriptions: Stay connected and track your fitness goals with our latest smartwatch. Featuring heart rate monitoring, step counting, and notifications, it's the perfect companion for an active lifestyle.
Our smartwatch combines style and functionality. Monitor your heart rate, track your steps, and receive notifications directly on your wrist.

products.name: Electric Kettle
products.brief_description: A 1.7-liter electric kettle with rapid boil technology and auto shut-off feature.
reference_descriptions: Boil water quickly and safely with our 1.7-liter electric kettle. Featuring rapid boil technology and an auto shut-off feature, it's perfect for any kitchen.
Our electric kettle combines speed and safety. With a 1.7-liter capacity, rapid boil technology, and auto shut-off, it's ideal for all your hot beverage needs.

products.name: Gaming Laptop
products.brief_description: A high-performance gaming laptop with a powerful GPU and fast refresh rate display.
reference_descriptions: Unleash your gaming potential with our high-performance gaming laptop. Equipped with a powerful GPU and a fast refresh rate display, it delivers smooth and immersive gameplay.
Experience next-level gaming with our advanced gaming laptop. Featuring a cutting-edge GPU and a high refresh rate screen, it's designed for serious gamers.

products.name: Yoga Mat
products.brief_description: A non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat with cushioning for comfort.
reference_descriptions: Enhance your yoga practice with our eco-friendly, non-slip yoga mat. With superior cushioning, it provides comfort and stability for all poses.
Our yoga mat offers a perfect balance of comfort and grip. Made from eco-friendly materials, it's designed to support your practice with non-slip stability and plush cushioning.

products.name: DSLR Camera
products.brief_description: A professional-grade DSLR camera with high resolution and fast autofocus.
reference_descriptions: Capture stunning photos with our professional-grade DSLR camera. Featuring high resolution and fast autofocus, it's perfect for both amateurs and professionals.
Take your photography to the next level with our DSLR camera. With exceptional resolution and rapid autofocus, it's ideal for capturing every moment with clarity.

products.name: Blender
products.brief_description: A high-speed blender with multiple settings and a durable glass jar.
reference_descriptions: Blend smoothies, soups, and more with our high-speed blender. Featuring multiple settings and a durable glass jar, it's a versatile addition to any kitchen.
Our high-speed blender is designed for performance and durability. With a variety of settings and a sturdy glass jar, it can handle all your blending needs.

products.name: Running Shoes
products.brief_description: Lightweight and breathable running shoes with superior cushioning.
reference_descriptions: Run comfortably with our lightweight and breathable running shoes. Featuring superior cushioning, they provide excellent support for long distances.
Experience comfort and performance with our running shoes. Designed for breathability and cushioning, they're perfect for runners of all levels.

products.name: Coffee Maker
products.brief_description: A programmable coffee maker with a built-in grinder and multiple brew settings.
reference_descriptions: Enjoy fresh coffee every morning with our programmable coffee maker. With a built-in grinder and multiple brew settings, it's easy to make the perfect cup.
Our coffee maker combines convenience and quality. Featuring a built-in grinder and customizable brew options, it ensures a fresh and delicious coffee experience.

products.name: Hair Dryer
products.brief_description: A powerful hair dryer with ionic technology and multiple heat settings.
reference_descriptions: Dry and style your hair quickly with our powerful hair dryer. Featuring ionic technology and multiple heat settings, it reduces frizz and enhances shine.
Our hair dryer offers salon-quality results at home. With advanced ionic technology and adjustable heat settings, it provides smooth and shiny hair with every use.
